ProductInfo.Features:
Up to 4 users can remotely control and monitor the system at the same time on a PC and with iPhone, Android Phone, Symbian, Blackberry and Windows Mobile. Receive automatic email notification for alarm events and hard drive status.
The DVR has 8 BNC inputs making the DVR compatible with most CCTV security cameras. There are 2 video outputs: a BNC for a spot monitor and a VGA to connect to most monitors. The system has 4 audio inputs and 1 audio output.
Save hard drive space and time viewing recordings by programming the recording options. Alarm Sensor (the system will begin recording only when an alarm is triggered) and Video Motion Detection (will record only when motion is detected in specified area).
There are 396 zones on each camera view that can be set to 6 different sensitivity levels from ignoring any motion to triggering instant recording when motion is detected. The DVR can perform predetermined actions in response to an alarm or motion event.
Whether used for the office, warehouse, retail store, or even your home, you can trust the Clover CDR0820 DVR for quality video protection. If you need additional information or have any questions please call our friendly staff or visit our web site.
